title: EstabMan Software
text:
Company Details 
Food Control Consultants limited (FCC) has announced the latest version of its EstabMan software which brings state-of-the-art technology to the recording and processing of inspection findings. 
The product of some seven years development, EstabMan offers significant efficiency improvements in recording and reporting the results of any type of Establishment Inspection. 
EstabMan is an invaluable tool for a Competent Authority undertaking statutory inspection or the Food Business Operator for internal controls in their businesses. 
Download to find out more. Available Downloads
